definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
Lei Feng (1940-1962), made into a model of altruism and dedication to the Party by propaganda from 1963 onwards

sentences.english: The Reapers' mines are definitely multi-purpose.
sentences.chinese: 收割者的雷肯定是多用途的。

sentences.english: Saturn's newest addition could explain how Cassini Regio came to be.
sentences.chinese: 土星的最新成员可以解释卡西尼雷吉奥出现。

sentences.english: North wind blows with thunder so loud.
Lester ruminated for a while, toying with his fork.
sentences.chinese: 雷斯脱手里拿一把叉玩弄着沉吟了半晌。

sentences.english: Ray just broke Reggie's NBA 3-point record this season.
sentences.chinese: 雷阿伦在该赛季刚刚打破了雷吉米勒的三分球记录。

sentences.english: In terms of honor, l stand aloof and will no reconcilement .
sentences.chinese: 雷为了荣誉，我的立场不会变，我们不可能调和。

sentences.english: The Mosel valley produces the best grapes for Germany's most famous wine, Riesling.
sentences.chinese: 此酒选用摩塞尔山谷出产的优质雷司令葡萄酿制而成。

sentences.english: Regus also supports the growing trend of mobile and home working.
sentences.chinese: 雷格斯亦支援日益受欢迎的流动办公及在家办公人士。

sentences.english: Was the music used in X-Ray Vision written and preformed by you?
sentences.chinese: 是雷视觉音乐的使用，你在X书面预制的？

sentences.english: There existed at the Chatelet in Paris a large and long cellar.
sentences.chinese: 从前在巴黎的小沙特雷，有个长长的大地牢。

sentences.english: Unique and decadent, The Seagate Hotel & Spa is a luxury Delray Beach resort.
sentences.chinese: 独特的希捷酒店是一家豪华德尔雷海滩度假胜地。

sentences.english: NIKOLAY DAVYDENKO: Shock, maybe just for press shocked, because Nadal always winning here.
sentences.chinese: 很雷，但是是压迫的雷，因为纳达尔在这儿总能赢。

sentences.english: Revolution is the vaccine of Jacquerie.
sentences.chinese: 革命是预防扎克雷运动的疫苗。

sentences.english: He goes to the American hospital I tell you, Rinaldi said.
sentences.chinese: 你明儿早上就要走了，乖乖，雷那蒂说。

sentences.english: With a whole village to the land mine he was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 带着全村人给他准备的土地雷。

sentences.english: As for Lester, he was affectionate and considerate.
sentences.chinese: 雷斯脱呢，对他也是多情的，顾念的。

definition: surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
